original_text: because your heart was penitent, and you humbled yourself before the Lord, when you heard how I spoke against this place and against its inhabitants, that they should become a desolation and a curse, and you have torn your clothes and wept before me, I also have heard you, declares the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 이 곳과 그 주민에게 대하여 빈 터가 되고 저주가 되리라 한 말을 네가 듣고 마음이 부드러워져서 여호와 앞 곧 내 앞에서 겸비하여 옷을 찢고 통곡하였으므로 나도 네 말을 들었노라 여호와가 말하였느니라

sentences.original_text: and you humbled yourself before the Lord
when you heard how I spoke against this place
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 내가 이곳을 향해 말한 것을 들었을 때
그리고 이곳 주민들을 향해 말한 것을 들었고

sentences.original_text: that they should become a desolation and a curse
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 황폐와 저주가 될 것이라는 말을 들었으며

sentences.original_text: and you have torn your clothes and wept before me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 내 앞에서 옷을 찢고 울었기 때문입니다
